mean_cn: n. 设计；图样；  vt. 设计
mean_en: the way something has been made; the way the parts of something (such as a building, machine, book, etc.) are formed and arranged for a particular use, effect, etc.
word_etyma: de加强 + sign记号 → design 设计
sentence: Look at these dress designs. They are so fashionable.
sentence_trans: 看这些裙子的设计，真是时尚。
